description: All of the BBQ out of this latest and greatest Oklahoma City BBQ mobile smokehouse is smoked over real charcoal and certified organic hardwood for a genuine smoky taste. "Our delicious offerings include BBQ basics such as brisket, pulled pork, ribs, and sides including baked beans, potato salad, cole slaw and Mac & Cheese.  In addition to our smoked meats and sweet, smoky baked beans, some of our most popular items include our custom BBQ sauces (Regular, Hot, Pineapple, Pineapple-Coconut, Mango-Habanero, and Carolina Vinegar).  Some of our best sellers are our signature sandwich called “The Flying Pig” consisting of ½ hot link combined with ½ smoked sausage, wrapped in bacon, smoked to perfection and served on a hoagie roll (smoked heaven on a bun), as well as our Loaded Baked Potato. We also do a great smokehouse burger for events or special events that is the most amazing burger out there."
name: The Flying Pig BBQ
